title: Tim McMahon from Mouthpiece & Hands Tied
itunes:title: Tim McMahon from Mouthpiece & Hands Tied
description:
Happy November! We have a great discussion with Tim McMahon from Mouthpiece/Hands Tied today on the show. The discussion topics include practicality, touring experiences and why he stays involved with the scene at large. Mouthpiece was a huge band for my early hardcore "discovery years" so I am proud to bring this chat to you. Visit SoundRink.com to check tour dates for your favorite bands find out about some incredible and immersive VIP experiences.  Use the code PC100WORDS for 15% off of your order from Rockabilia.com, the best merch store on the internet. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
